name: Graviry
description:
Game's a week first project: One Button Game. Game Description

Move the ball towards the walls in order to reach the goal. This game is played by only using the mouse.

Clicking the wall once will bring the ball towards the wall. Once in the wall clicking the wall again will reduce your falling speed.

Release Notes Patch 1.0

-Added Start Menu
-Added End Screen
-Added Level Select Menu
-Added 3rd Level
-Modified Controls for smoother and more accurate commands.

Patch 0.5

First playable demo:

-Two Levels

-Working Menu accesible with Esc.
